column1: Master of Science (Architecture) in Sustainable Architecture
column5: Reimagining the built environment to create a more sustainable futureAre you a creative designer and critical thinker with a passion for architecture and creating a better world? In our Master’s Programme in Architecture, specialized in Sustainable Architecture, we reimagine the built environment to better answer to the diverse societal, cultural and environmental challenges the world is facing. You will do this together with other students, architects and researchers in a vivid social community. Join us in building a more sustainable
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
